title: Analyze Inventory Turnover
description: An analyst wants to calculate the inventory turnover rate for a specific product category to assess its efficiency.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) for the product category for the last 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the total COGS value.

tasks.description: Retrieve the average inventory value for the same category over the same period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the average inventory value.

tasks.description: Calculate the inventory turnover ratio (COGS / Average Inventory).
tasks.expected_outcome: The turnover ratio is calculated as 4.5.

tasks.description: Compare the result to the industry benchmark and include it in a performance dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent notes the turnover is slightly below the benchmark of 5.0 and adds the metric to a report.
